content: The establishment Dems haven’t learned a thing. Thompson asked the DCCC for a lousy $20,000 to help with his campaign and they said no. Meanwhile, he raised a lot of money from small donors. And when polling and early voting showed him doing well, the DCCC finally showed up — the day before the election — and helped make phone calls. Too little, too late — and then they wonder why they can’t win locally.
